title: Info Test Case

info.description:
This testcase shows the use of the info editor. The info editor is a special editor that leaves no footprint in the form results.

This editor can be used to insert textual blocks in the form. If the DOMPurify library is loaded you can also use HTML tags.
  • The title property is used for the header
  • The description property is used for the bodytext.

test1.title: This is the header from the 'title' property
test1.description: This is the bodytext from the 'description' property.

test2.title: This is the header from the title property (With HTML Tags)
test2.description: This is the bodytext from the description property. (With HTML Tags)

test3.title: This is the header (bodytext used for inserting image)

desc: This testcase shows the use of the info editor. The info editor is a special editor that leaves no footprint in the form results.
